entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is in charge of discipline. He has pale, wild eyes and a soft, greasy voice.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is mentioned as being present in the corridor with Filch.

relationships.description: Harry passes Filch almost in the doorway, but Filch's eyes look straight through him.
Snape is present in the corridor with Filch when Harry arrives, and Snape responds to Filch's voice.
